scripts.dev: concurrently "cd graphql && npm run start" "wait-on tcp:localhost:4000 && NODE_OPTIONS='--trace-warnings' next dev"
scripts.install-all: cd graphql && npm install && cd .. && npm install
scripts.build: concurrently "cd graphql && npm run start" "wait-on tcp:localhost:4000 && NODE_OPTIONS='--trace-warnings' next build && next export"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd graphql && npm run start" "wait-on tcp:localhost:4000 && next start"
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd graphql && npm run start" "wait-on tcp:localhost:4000 && npx serve@latest out"
